Calculator Design 1

Well i've finally done it, it took me ages but I have made another calculator and this time it is one with a full standard interface. I went on loads of different tutorial sites but all of their methods either didnt work or were rubbish and complicated. So I decided to build one myself from scratch the way I wanted to make, and I think my way is very neat! :P I will be making a tutorial on how to make this type of calculator once i've got past some of the other projects that I have planned. As usual feel free to use the code in any way that you like. Thanks for reading. :)
